Detailed Description

Oriented box module Module that handles oriented boxes

Function Documentation

orxCONST orxOBOX *  _pstOp,
orxFLOAT  _fAngle 
)

Rotates in 2D an OBox

Parameters:
[out] _pstRes OBox where to store result
[in] _pstOp OBox to rotate (its Z-axis vector will be unchanged)
[in] _fAngle Z-axis rotation angle
Returns:
Rotated OBox

[in] _pvSize Size vector

orxOBOX / orxNULL

orxSTATIC orxINLINE orxBOOL orxOBox_2DTestIntersection ( orxCONST orxOBOX *  _pstBox1,
orxCONST orxOBOX *  _pstBox2 
)

Tests oriented 2D box intersection (simple Z-axis test, to use with Z-axis aligned orxOBOX)

Parameters:
[in] _pstBox1 First box operand
[in] _pstBox2 Second box operand
Returns:
orxTRUE if boxes intersect, orxFALSE otherwise

orxCONST orxVECTOR *  _pvPosition

Parameters:
[in] _pstBox Box to test against position
